description: Agrojusto is an innovative initiative focused on transforming the food marketing landscape to create a fairer and more efficient system for small farmers and traders. The organization leverages technology to enhance the connection between small producers and the entire value chain, aiming to improve commercialization processes. Agrojusto offers a subscription-based service for both marketers and producers, adapting its business model to different countries, such as Argentina and Mexico, where it collaborates with NGOs to implement tailored programs that address local needs.
name: Agrojusto
